title: Psychotherapy 2.0 Online Training Summit (2015)
description:
Psychotherapy 2.0 Online Training Summit (2015)
Leading-Edge Discoveries and Teachings on Neuroscience, Trauma, Mindfulness, and Attachment Therapy

Rick Hanson - Positive Neuroplasticity: Using the New Brain Science for Maximum Therapeutic Outcomes

Ellyn Bader - Lies, Deception, Infidelity and Jealousy: The Deep Pits that Destroy Couples Connection

Sue Johnson - Mastering The Core Tasks of Effective Couple Therapy

Stephen W. Porges - The Clinical Application of Polvagal Theory in Therapy

Joan Borysenko - Psychotherapy and Mind-Body Medicine: From Immunology to Neuroscience

Michele Weiner-Davis - It Takes One to Tango: Doing Couples Therapy with Individuals

Bonnie Badenoch - Deepening Presence in a Distracted World

David Wallin - The Impact of Who We Are on What We Do: Attachment and Enactment in Psychotherapy

Peter Levine - Going Beyond Trauma Therapy to Find Love & Happiness

Diane Poole Heller - Mindfulness, Compassion & the Courage to Connect: Cutting Edge Corrective Experiences that Restore Secure Attachment

Bill O'Hanlon - Inclusive Therapy: A Gentle Way to Dissolve Resistance, Reduce Ambivalence to Change & Increase Therapy Results

Esther Perel - The Double Flame: Reconciling Intimacy and Sexuality

Ronald D. Siegel - Tailoring Mindfulness: Fitting the Practice to the Person

Dan Siegel - An Interpersonal Neurobiolgy Approach to Trauma and its Treatment
